name: Toggle Sit/Stand. (/sit, /stand)
Toggle Walk/Run. (/walk, /run)
Attacks selected target(s), or takes a general action if the target cannot be attacked. Hold down the Ctrl key and click to attack by force. \n\n(/attack, /attackforce)

Leave the party. (/leave)
If you are the leader of the party, dismiss selected members from your party. (/dismiss)
Sets up a private store  to sell your items. (/vendor)
Display the party matching window to search for parties or to add members to your party.  (/partymatching)
